name: TRACHI – ANARCHY
description:
Everyone has something to live for.

– Everybody needs a home.
New Name, New Identity.TRACHI – ANARCHY is a tactical role-playing game with a heavy emphasis on character development, exploration and replayability. Featuring all 18 characters of AUTONOMY and more, the second entry to the TRACHI series aims to combine ruthless storytelling with relentless gameplay experiences.

ANARCHY provides.

Each of the four Acts portrays a shared struggle from a different point of view. For the first act – PARADISE, a girl named Lorna takes the centre stage. Driven by a deep desire to talk to someone special, she's set her mind to put things right – and smash the status quo.

A world too good to be true

Step by step, memories of a shattered world return. Eventually, facts become impossible to deny. And with that, each character has to come to terms with both their identity and history. All of it pointing to a single question: Whether to forgive, or to forget again.

Ad infinitum

Without death, there's always a second chance. There is no Game Over, because the game never ends. Even shattering defeats drive progression forward, as both the characters and their experience always return to life. To try and try again.

Survival of the fittest

Unless one day, the flames go out. And without fire, death is permanent. If you're willing to risk it all, a special mode – ECSTASY – awaits. So that you, as well, can prove your immortality.
